generated_text:
- road: The image shows a multi-lane road with white lane markings and a dashed center line, indicating it is a road for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: A paved path running parallel to the road on the right side, with pedestrians walking on it, is clearly visible as a sidewalk.
- vegetation: Numerous trees and bushes are visible along both sides of the road, indicating the presence of vegetation.
- sky: The upper portion of the image shows a gray, overcast sky, which is open and without leaves of trees.
- person: Two individuals are visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- car: A black car is visible directly ahead in the same direction of travel, and another car is visible in the opposite direction further down the road.
- traffic sign: A triangular warning sign with an exclamation mark and a rectangular sign below it are visible on a pole on the right side of the road.
- pole: A tall, thin pole with a traffic sign attached to it is visible on the right side of the road. Another pole is visible on the left side of the road.
- fence: A low fence or barrier is visible along the left side of the road, separating the road from a wooded area.
